title: Responsibilities and Accountabilities - Team Members
steps: Follow the Managing Customer Threatening Situations 4Ds.
constraints: Under the federal Sex Discrimination Act 1984 it is illegal in Australia to discriminate against a person either directly or indirectly on the grounds of breastfeeding.
This means, a woman has the right to breastfeed, or express milk, anywhere she chooses. This includes our stores.
troubleshooting: Customer complaint about breastfeeding or expressing: advise them that this is a women's right under Australian Federal Law; if uncomfortable, unsure, or if the complaint escalates, seek help from your Store Manager.
